segments.text: The little girl is so cute, standing there with her hand out, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she knows her brother will share with her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how kids can be so trusting and sure of each other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her eyes are fixed on the cookie jar, and she's so excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember being that age, waiting for a treat, feeling like it was the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even notice the water on the floor or the unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: In her mind, it's all about those cookies and the promise of a sweet treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope her brother shares with her and doesn't hog all the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's such a sweet girl, and I hope she gets what she's wishing for.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids like her make me smile, so full of life and joy.
segments.speaker: PAR
